software-composition-analysis.name: Veracode-Get-EPSS-Info
software-composition-analysis.description: Gets all the SCA findings available to the user, including EPSS scores and percentiles.

software-composition-analysis.name: Veracode-SCA-Webhook-Redirect
software-composition-analysis.description: This Project exposes a Tomcat server that can redirect Veracode Agent-based SCA web hooks to Teams and Slack.

software-composition-analysis.name: yarn-v2-workspaces-helper
software-composition-analysis.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 2 and lower

software-composition-analysis.name: yarn-v3-workspaces-helper
software-composition-analysis.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 3 and higher

software-composition-analysis.name: veracode-bulk-cve-suppression
software-composition-analysis.description: Allows for bulk suppression of specific CVE across full application portfolio

software-composition-analysis.name: Bulk add teams to workspaces
software-composition-analysis.description: Allows for adding teams to workspaces in bulk.

software-composition-analysis.name: Veracode Workspace Auto Create
software-composition-analysis.description: Uses the Veracode Agent Based Scan API and other Veracode REST APIs to automatically create a workspace for application profiles in a Veracode organization.
